data: It is nasty, dirty weather outside there on the puszta; the sky is cloudy, the earth muddy, the rain has been falling for two weeks incessantly, as if by special command.
It is nasty, dirty weather outside there on the _puszta_; the sky is cloudy, the earth muddy, the rain has been falling for two weeks incessantly, as if by special command.
